definitions.text: a texture without roughness; smooth to the touch
examples: admiring the slim smoothness of her thighs
some artists prefer the smoothness of a board
his eloquence attracted a large congregation
fluency in spoken and written English is essential
his oily smoothness concealed his guilt from the police

definitions.text: the quality of being bland and gracious or ingratiating in manner
the quality of having a level and even surface
examples: the water was a glassy smoothness
the weather system of the Pacific is determined by the uninterrupted smoothness of the ocean

definitions.text: the quality of being free from errors or interruptions
examples: the five-speed manual gearbox is smoothness personified
